Hero.Resumen: We are dedicated to comprehensive training, guiding the next generation of soccer players through dedication, respect, and the continuous pursuit of personal improvement.

Footer.Pregunta: Are you ready to sign up or do you have any questions? Click here. We are waiting for you!

Servicios.DescripcionVitoria: Complementary services to maximize your development as an athlete at our headquarters in Vitoria.
Servicios.DescripcionValencia: Complementary services to maximize your development as an athlete at our Valencia headquarters.

service-gym.descripcion: Access our state-of-the-art facilities to improve your strength, agility, and endurance. Personalized training plans available.

service-nutrition.descripcion: Our sports nutritionists will help you optimize your diet to achieve maximum performance and faster recovery.

service-physiotherapy.descripcion: Physiotherapy services specializing in the prevention and treatment of sports injuries to keep you on the field.

service-organizations.descripcion: We promote personal development with customized services for organizations and clubs.

Sedes.SubtituloSedesVitoria: We have two locations in Vitoria. We have carefully selected our facilities to ensure a high-quality training environment.
Sedes.SubtituloSedesValencia: We have two locations in Valencia. We have carefully selected our facilities to ensure a high-quality training environment.

sede-olabide.descripcion: A comprehensive program for improving soccer skills for all levels, in first-class facilities.
detalles: Location: Olabide Ikastola (Soccer Field 11)
Students from Ikastola Olabide, as well as other educational centers and sports organizations, may attend.
Schedule: Monday to Thursday, 6:00 p.m. - 7:15 p.m.
Ages: 2007-2019 (check groups)
Sessions: There is flexibility to choose between one, two, or three sessions per week.
Mandatory use of official equipment

sede-estadio.descripcion: A complete sports complex with multiple fields and modern equipment for comprehensive training.
detalles: Location: Fundación Estadio
Access: Only for Estadio Foundation members
Monday and Wednesday (5:45-6:45 p.m.): 2014-2015
Sessions: There is flexibility to choose between one, two, or three sessions per week.
Mandatory use of official equipment

sede-colegio-mayor.descripcion: An old and important student residence in Valencia, strategically located between the main campuses (Tarongers and Vera).
detalles: Description: One of the most important student residences in Valencia.
Strategic Location: Located between the Tarongers (UV) and Vera (UPV) university campuses.
Additional Services: Exclusive bus service for other institutions.
Sports Facilities: Access to cardio room and fitness room (gym).
Season: 2025-26.

sede-saguntino.descripcion: Key training headquarters in the Valencian Community, located in an area with a long football tradition.
detalles: TS Methodology: Training under the professional guidance of Gaizka Toquero and his technical team.
Strategic Location: Sagunto (Valencia), connected to the Ausias March Residence by transport.
Facilities: Artificial turf fields for maximum performance optimization.
Focus: Improving understanding of the game, individual optimization, and continuous progression (360∘ pillars of the Academy).
Season: 2025-26.

Coaches.Subtitulo: A professional team dedicated and committed to your athletic and personal growth.

gaizka-toquero-vitoria.bio: Gaizka Toquero is a former soccer player. He played for Athletic Club, Deportivo Alavés, and Real Zaragoza. With a career spanning more than a decade in professional soccer, he has played in more than 300 games and scored 42 goals in the top division.

gaizka-toquero-valencia.bio: Gaizka Toquero is a former soccer player. He played for Athletic Club, Deportivo Alavés, and Real Zaragoza. With a career spanning more than a decade in professional soccer, he has played in more than 300 games and scored 42 goals in the top division.

eneko-reyes.bio: As Technical Director, Eneko oversees the training methodology and soccer development of all categories of the academy.

aner-aldave.bio: Aner Aldave, Tactical Video Analyst, both individual and collective. He uses match footage to identify patterns in the game, both strengths and weaknesses, and suggests tactical adjustments. He offers different types of analysis (team or opponent, zonal, ABP, and individual) with advanced technology, providing the knowledge necessary to take performance to the next level.

iban-triviño.bio: An expert in specific goalkeeper training, Iban helps our goalkeepers reach their full potential.

pablo-diez.bio: Pablo specializes in the individual and collective technical-tactical development of our players, helping them reach their full potential on the field.

edu-roldan.bio: Specializing in sports injuries, Edu helps our players recover and prevent future injuries, ensuring their maximum performance on the field.

david-soriano.role: Director of Logistics and Business Development
david-soriano.bio: Responsible for optimizing the academy's daily operations and logistics, while driving growth and economic sustainability through the development of new programs and commercial agreements.

carlos-ballesteros.bio: Responsible for establishing the academy's international network of contacts. Focuses on identifying and managing global development and scouting opportunities for players with the greatest potential.

adrian-martinez.bio: Responsible for the sports and methodology area. Leads the technical staff and uses his experience as an agent to identify, project, and advise players with future potential.

cristian-de-luis.bio: Technical leader of the academy. Designs, implements, and supervises the training methodology, ensuring unity in teaching and the correct progression of all players.

idurre.bio: Idurre applies a structured methodology adapted to each stage and team to ensure consistent, meaningful sessions geared towards real play.

Contacto.Descripcion: Ready to get started? Contact us and take the first step.
